name: 2nd World Conference on Computer and Information Technology
content: Join the global conversation on it at the computer science conference The 2nd World Conference on Computer and Information Technology is the ultimate gathering of professionals in the field which be held on 19-21 July 2024 in Copenhagen Denmark.. With a diverse range of topics and speakers, you’ll gain valuable insights and make connections that will propel your career forward. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to learn from and network with the best.
topics: Computer Graphics, Animation, Virtual Reality & Gaming
